title: Integrate a Satellite with a Launch Vehicle
description: Engineers at a launch site must physically mount a satellite onto the launch vehicle's payload adapter.

tasks.description: Verify that both the satellite and the payload adapter have passed all pre-integration checks.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the status of all checks is 'complete'.

tasks.description: Oversee the crane operation to lift and position the satellite onto the adapter.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent monitors the physical process to ensure it follows the procedure.

tasks.description: Connect the umbilical cords for data and power between the satellite and the launch vehicle, and perform a final interface check.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms all connections are secure and a successful data link is established.
